name: Potter's Field
description:
A five minute walk to search for your neighbour, the widow Potter.

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move. Walk into things to interact.
Don't drop what mother told you to carry.

I'm so sorry you have to download this! I was struggling all Halloween night to force this into an HTML5 export but I just cannae get it to work: there seems to be a WebGL error involved that I don't have the know-how to solve right now. That and the illustrations will have to be a very "I'll fix it in post" matter.

If you're on Chrome, you're meant to be able to play this in browser. If you're on any other browser you're meant to be able to right-click the frame into a new tab to circumvent the SharedBufferArray error. It will run like this but will not show any graphics! So we'll see how to solve it. For now, the download .exe works just fine! Again, sorry.

Finally, the volume may run a bit on the low side, be ready to turn it up as necessary.
